Entries.PkmnCreatureCollectText: Some {PkmnSpecies:Text} have found their way into the Valley. Can you find {Count} of them and send them home?                                                                                                                                       — Spiritomb
Entries.PkmnCreatureCollectObj1Text: Input {Count} x {PkmnSpecies:Text} to the PC at the Quest Board.
Entries.PkmnBerryCollectText: There's a {PkmnBerry:Text} shortage where I'm from and your farming abilities are legendary. I need {Count} freshly picked!                                                                                                 — Spiritomb
Entries.PkmnBerryCollectObj1Text: Input {Count} x {PkmnBerry:Text} to the PC at the Quest Board.
